function.name: iochar_regdrv_power
function.summary: Register as a power-managed device driver

function.name: iochar_send_event
function.summary: Send a pulse event into io-char's event handler

function.name: kick
function.summary: Kick the output driver into life

function.name: timer_queue
function.summary: Add a timer entry to the io-char timer queue

function.name: timer_remove
function.summary: Remove a timer entry from the io-char timer queue.

function.name: ttc
function.synopsis: #include <sys/io-char.h>\n int ttc(int type, void *ptr, int arg );\n

function.name: tti
function.summary: Pass data or error and control codes to io-char

function.name: tti2
function.summary: Pass a data buffer or error and control codes to io-char
function.synopsis: #include <sys/io-char.h>\n int tti2(TTYDEV *dev, unsigned char *char_buf, int len, uint16_t ctrl);\n

function.name: tto_checkclients
function.summary: Check client lists for notify conditions

function.name: tto_getchar
function.summary: Get the first character from the output buffer to process

function.name: tx_inject
function.summary: Inject a character at the front of the output buffer

function.name: wait_add
function.summary: Add a new wait entry to the client message buffer

function.name: wait_remove_rcvid
function.summary: Remove the rcvid matching the wait entry
